mapper.select: SELECT a.log_id AS logId, u.username, a.action_type AS actionType, a.target_entity_type AS targetEntityType, a.target_entity_id AS targetEntityId, a.details, a.client_ip_address AS clientIpAddress, a.created_at AS createdAt FROM audit_logs a INNER JOIN users u ON a.user_id = u.user_id ORDER BY a.created_at DESC
